title: Laws on Sexual Purity
summary: Leviticus 18 lists prohibited sexual relationships and practices, many of which were common among the surrounding nations. God calls Israel to be holy and not follow the ways of Egypt or Canaan.

faq.question: Why are these laws important?
faq.answer: They protect family structures and reflect God's standard of holiness for His people.

faq.question: What happens if these laws are broken?
faq.answer: The land will become defiled, and those who sin will be cut off from the community.
